author: p2l1-gtEmulator
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a couple of issues we found with certain yet unused cuts during initialization and while using our VHDL writer tool:

* Fix m/dR cut to use the correct hardware conversion function
* Fix absolute isolation cut initialization parameter name
* Bind absolute isolation hardware conversion functions to Python, to use in our VHDL writer tool
* Fix 3-body invariant and transverse mass resolution reduction initialization and add some comments explaining this functionality better

These additional cuts were extensively tested with "dummy" seeds on our side and also validated against the Firmware.
title: Phase-2 GT: Fix cut initialization copy paste errors
